plot: When a crooked land grabber with a desire to steal even more land and usher in the 'green movement' through violence, with a one-of-a-kind pistol, only one man can stop him...and he isn't available.
title: The Platinum Peacemaker
plot_es: When a crooked land grabber with a desire to steal even more land and usher in the 'green movement' through violence, with a one-of-a-kind pistol, only one man can stop him...and he isn't available.
plot_en: When a crooked land grabber with a desire to steal even more land and usher in the 'green movement' through violence, with a one-of-a-kind pistol, only one man can stop him...and he isn't available.
